name: New Workflow
description:
Develop a concept for an autonomous website featuring a directory of artificial intelligence tools that integrate with affiliate programs to generate passive income, incorporating diverse content types including:

Articles
Tool reviews
AI news
Blog posts
YouTube Shorts
Facebook ads and posts

The website's directory should offer a comprehensive listing of AI tools, with detailed information on each tool's features, pricing, and affiliate program integration.

Generate:

1. A content strategy to drive organic traffic to the website through high-quality, engaging content across various formats.
2. A plan to optimize the website for optimal conversion rates, focusing on affiliate program sign-ups and sales.
3. A directory structure and taxonomy to efficiently categorize and showcase AI tools, enabling users to easily find relevant tools based on specific needs or applications.
4. A system for regular content updates, incorporating emerging AI topics, tool reviews, and industry news.
5. A content creation schedule, outlining the content types, frequency, and distribution channels (e.g., blog posts, YouTube Shorts, Facebook ads).

Assume:

* The website will utilize existing affiliate networks and APIs for seamless integration with AI tools.
* Content will be created using various formats, including long-form articles, short-form social media posts, and video content.
* The website will be designed with a user-centric experience, prioritizing easy navigation and discovery of relevant AI tools.

Evaluate the following metrics for success:

* Monthly unique visitors
* Affiliate program sign-ups and sales
* Average order value
* Conversion rates
* Return on ad spend (ROAS) for paid advertising campaigns
* Engagement metrics (e.g., likes, shares, comments) across various social media platforms

Note: Regularly review and adjust the content strategy, directory, and system to ensure the website remains up-to-date, relevant, and competitive in the AI tool market.

config.description: A user proxy agent that executes code.

config.name: primary_assistant
config.description: A primary assistant agent that writes plans and code to solve tasks.
